requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
